links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6, -12, 9, -2).
maple: with(combstruct): SeqSeqSeqL := [T, {T=Sequence(S, card > 1), S=Sequence(U, card > 1), U=Sequence(Z, card >0)}, unlabeled]: seq(count(SeqSeqSeqL, size=j), j=1..29); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 16 2009
mathematica: Table[Fibonacci[2n]-2^n+1,{n,0,30}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[ {6,-12,9,-2},{0,0,0,1},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 19 2012 *)
prog: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,3,1)-lucas_number1(n,3,2) for n in xrange(0,30)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 06 2008
